1.title: A Woman's Place Is in the Boardroom
1.plot: Ansgar Gabrielsen, the former Minister for Trade and Industry in Norway, explains why he instigated a law insisting on 40% female representation in the boardroom.

2.title: Ditching the Dollar
2.plot: Robert Mundell, the Nobel Prize winning economist, has long advocated replacing the American Dollar as the world's reserve currency with a new global currency. But would a global currency run by the IMF be politically and economically workable?

3.title: The American Pipe Dream
3.plot: Amory Lovins, founder and CEO of the Rocky Mountain Institute, believes America can wean itself off oil has drawn up a plan to achieve it. Lovins takes us through his blue-print for achieving an oil-free America by 2050.

imdb.plot outline: Every so often someone comes up with an idea that changes the world - ideas about how we organise and run our society or the way we live our lives that can have a dramatic impact on millions of people. This series looks at some of the most ambitious schemes of the 21st Century.
imdb.title: Thinking Big
plot: Every so often someone comes up with an idea that changes the world - ideas about how we organise and run our society or the way we live our lives that can have a dramatic impact on millions of people. This series looks at some of the most ambitious schemes of the 21st Century.::Anonymous
